description: Full-featured custom printing e-commerce platform with AI-powered product generation

features.name: AI Product Builder E2E Testing
features.description: Test complete AI product creation flow end-to-end to verify all fixes work correctly. This includes testing: multi-model image generation, user image selection, mockup generation for both flat_lay and mr_imagine templates, and final product with 3 images.
tests: Create new product via AI Product Builder with valid prompt
Verify 3 images generated from different AI models (Imagen 4, Flux, Recraft)
Select one image and verify non-selected images are deleted
Verify 2 mockup jobs created (flat_lay + mr_imagine)
Verify final product has exactly 3 images (1 selected + 2 mockups)

features.name: Railway Production Deployment
features.description: Deploy the AI Product Builder to Railway production environment and verify worker processes jobs correctly. Ensure environment variables are configured and worker service runs properly.
tests: Build passes with no TypeScript errors
Frontend deploys successfully to Railway
Worker service starts and connects to database
Worker processes replicate_image jobs correctly
Worker processes replicate_mockup jobs correctly

features.name: Mockup Progress Indicators
features.description: Add progress indicators for mockup generation to provide better user experience during async processing. Show real-time status updates for each mockup job.
tests: Progress UI component shows pending state for queued jobs
Progress updates to 'processing' when worker picks up job
Progress updates to 'completed' when mockup is ready
Progress shows error state if mockup generation fails
UI auto-refreshes to show new mockup images when complete

features.name: Mockup Retry Logic
features.description: Implement retry logic for failed mockup generation to make the system more resilient to API failures. Include exponential backoff and max retry limits.
tests: Failed mockup job is automatically retried
Retry uses exponential backoff (1s, 2s, 4s, etc.)
Maximum of 3 retries before marking job as permanently failed
Retry count is tracked in ai_jobs table
User notified of permanent failure with option to manually retry

features.name: Mockup Regeneration
features.description: Add ability for users to regenerate specific mockups if they are not satisfied with the result. Allows user control over final image quality.
tests: Regenerate button appears for each mockup image
Clicking regenerate creates new mockup job for that template
Old mockup is replaced when new one completes
Regeneration count is tracked to prevent abuse
User can regenerate up to 3 times per mockup type

features.name: Error Handling Improvements
features.description: Implement comprehensive error handling in mockup generation pipeline. Improve diagnostics and user feedback for failures.
tests: All API errors are caught and logged with context
User-friendly error messages displayed in UI
Error details stored in ai_jobs table for debugging
Failed jobs can be inspected in admin dashboard
Alerts sent for critical failures (optional: email/slack)

features.name: Dead Code Cleanup
features.description: Remove autoQueueMockupJob function and other dead code from the codebase. Clean up unused imports and commented-out code blocks.
tests: autoQueueMockupJob function removed from ai-jobs-worker.ts
No references to removed function exist
TypeScript compilation passes
Worker still processes jobs correctly after cleanup
Build size reduced (verify bundle output)

features.name: DTF Optimization Tests
features.description: Add unit tests for DTF optimization service to ensure critical image processing logic has test coverage.
tests: Test DTF optimizer handles various image formats
Test color profile conversion works correctly
Test sizing calculations are accurate
Test error handling for invalid inputs
Test output matches expected print-ready specifications

features.name: Configurable Mockup Types
features.description: Make mockup types configurable or database-driven instead of hardcoded. Allow adding new mockup templates without code changes.
tests: Mockup types stored in database table
Admin can add/edit/delete mockup types
Worker dynamically loads available mockup types
Product creation wizard shows available mockup options
Backward compatible with existing flat_lay and mr_imagine

features.name: Job Status Tracking Dashboard
features.description: Improve worker job status tracking with visibility into job progress and failure reasons from frontend. Add admin dashboard for monitoring.
tests: Admin dashboard shows all jobs with status
Real-time updates via polling or websockets
Job details page shows full logs and error traces
Filter jobs by status (pending, processing, completed, failed)
Bulk retry/cancel operations available
